name: Ile Rousse Hotel Thalazur Bandol

reviews.text: If you go to this hotel expecting 5* service and amenities you will be disappointed. Having said that, if you go expecting a good 4* hotel you won't be disappointed. The good points = beautifully decorated; decent size rooms; fantastic location; and, good quality food. The bad points = poor pool side service; shortage of beach loungers; some bathrooms look old/tired; and, some staff were a little 'indifferent' to our problems. Overall highly recommended if you go with realistic expectations.
reviews.title: Not 5* but still very good

reviews.text: After having stayed in the Ile Rousse a number of times we were all very disapointed on this occasion and hope that it was just a one off.
reviews.title: Going Downhill

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: It seems like they are going through hard times. To start of with the TV in one of the rooms had only sound and no picture, the wifi also did not work and when this was pointed out it took over 2 days to fix both problems, and then the wifi went down again by the evening.
reviews.title: Pure Luxury

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: When we asked if we could have help checking in for our return flights, as the wifi was not working, we were told they could not assist.
reviews.title: Excellent

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Some of the staff in the bar were not at all helpful. There does not seem to be anyone in charge or mentoring the very young and inexperienced staff.
reviews.title: In my top 5

description: Facing Rènecros Bay, the waterfront Thalazur Thalassotherapy & Spa Ile Rousse ***** Hotel offers a magical environment in which to serve your body and your mind.Discover the outdoor infinity pool with sea water heated all year round, a solarium overlooking the clear waters of Rènecros Bay and two private beaches.In discrete luxury, the hotel, with direct access by elevator to the Institute, has 67 rooms including 12 spacious suites.
